resources.string:
This application serves as a technical showcase for the libsubsonic library.

To get started, please keep the following in mind:

Check your Logs: This app is a headless style demo. All server responses, raw JSON, and library events are printed to Logcat. Filter by application package name to see the library working under the hood.

Server Configuration: On the following screen, you will be prompted for your Server URL, username, and password. These are required to authenticate against the Subsonic API and begin the demo.
